name: Project: RE.VE.LA.TION (ZX Spectrum)
description:
Project: RE.VE.LA.TION (REmote VErtical LAnding rocket control statTION) is a Lunar Lander like videogame for the Sinclair ZX Spectrum computer.

Control the rocket descent by changing it thrust and orientation and make it safely reach the landing area. Avoid crashing into obstacles and hitting the landing pad at too high a velocity. You have a limited amount of fuel, so be careful not to waste it!

Default keyboard controls:
O: rotate counterclockwise
P: rotate clockwise
Z: thrust

Project: RE.VE.LA.TION was originally coded for the Lander Challenge, organized by the RetroProgramming Italia group. The game has been developed in C language and built with z88dk, using the SP1 software sprite library and the BeepFX beeper sound effects. Levels designed with Tiled and converted using NTiled. Loading screen earth image adapted from the "Earthrise" Apollo 8 capture (NASA). Title font: Nasalization by Typodermic. Thanks to Derek Fountain.  Emulation powered by JSSpeccy.
